definitions.body: keep watch of, be wakeful over, ´[[י]]: subj., [[עַל]] pers., to benefit or injure Je 31:28, Je 31:28, Je 44:27; [[עַל]] rei, to perform it Je 1:12, Da 9:14; so (men subj.) [[שׁׂקְדֵי אָוֶן]] Is 29:20; of leopard watching [[לְַ־עָרֵיהֶם]] Je 5:6 (to seize prey, fig.); of man watching (for admission) at ([[עַל]]) wisdom’s doors Pr 8:34 (‖[[שָׁמַר ]]); = keep guard over ([[עַל]]) Job 21:32, cf. (abs.) [[וְשִׁמְרוּ]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ezr 8:29 and (of watchman, [[שׁׂמֵר]]) Ps 127:1.
be wakeful, wake, as mourner, sufferer Ps 102:8.—La 1:14 rd. perh.

definitions.body: Pf. [[נִשְׁקַד עַל־פְּשָׁעַי]] (LXX Bu) watch has been kept over my transgressions (cf.
